function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inability to identify chronic effects of exergames","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of standardized risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited support for the idea that physical activity helps reduce disease severity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of exceeding sedentary screen time recommendations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restricted spaces for aerobic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inactivity due to quarantine and social isolation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity diversity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncontrolled progression in exercise intensity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of
